title: LXQt 1.4 Desktop Environment Officially Released, This Is What’s New
description:
LXQt 1.4 desktop environment is now available with improvements to file manager, image viewer, terminal emulator, session, and panel.

The post LXQt 1.4 Desktop Environment Officially Released, This Is What’s New appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
